attributes.action: Enforce a capped mark-up on resold (touted) Music Event Tickets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We at the Better Festival Group believe it's time to address the way ticket touts abuse music fans by purchasing large quantities of festival/event tickets for the sole purpose of selling them on at hugely inflated prices, preying on music fans to make fast and easy money.

We want to see a mark-up put on resold music event tickets capped at 15% of the face value of the ticket. 

Please help like minded music fans like yourself to have a fair chance in seeing your favourite bands play live by signing our petition.
